summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 38th Avenue North, between East Howe Street and East Newton Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7492, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
